notes: ## Questionnaire → Pillar Mapping
This table shows how validated clinical questionnaires map to the Sleep 360° pillars.
| Questionnaire | Primary Pillar(s) | Items | Tier | Trigger/Use |
| Demographics | Social | 6 | CORE | Always - Basic information |
| Core Sleep Questions | Sleep Quality, Sleep Quantity, Sleep Regularity, Sleep Timing | 37 | CORE/GATEWAY | Universal sleep assessment |
| PSQI | Sleep Quality | 19 | CORE/EXPANSION | Partial CORE, full EXPANSION |
| ISI | Sleep Quality | 8 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Sleep problem identified |
| DBAS-16 | Sleep Quality | 16 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Insomnia symptoms |
| ESS | Sleep Quality | 8 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Daytime sleepiness |
| MEQ | Sleep Timing | 19 | EXPANSION | Chronotype assessment |
| Berlin Questionnaire | Metabolic, Physical | 10 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Snoring/apnea risk |
| STOP-BANG | Metabolic, Physical | 8 | EXPANSION | Alternative OSA screening |
| PHQ-9 | Mental Health | 9 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Depression screening |
| GAD-7 | Mental Health | 7 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Anxiety screening |
| DASS-21 | Mental Health | 21 | EXPANSION | Comprehensive mental health |
| PROMIS-Cognitive | Cognitive | 8 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Cognitive concerns |
| FSS | Physical | 9 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Fatigue symptoms |
| BPI | Physical | 9 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Pain symptoms |
| FOSQ-10 | Physical | 10 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Functional impacts |
| PSAS | Mental Health | 15 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Pre-sleep arousal |
| MEDAS | Nutritional | 14 | EXPANSION | Mediterranean diet assessment |
| Sleep Hygiene | Sleep Quality, Nutritional | 13 | EXPANSION | Gateway: Poor sleep habits |
## Summary Statistics
